markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Desert Tracker](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=75)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 58 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** Golden Road

</column>

You’re at home blazing trails in the burning sands, and you made a living guiding or following creatures in the desert. You might be a native nomad, an experienced desert guide, a naturalist, a bandit driven into the dunes by the law—or all of the above.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution
or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) skill, and the [Desert Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Experienced Tracker](/Feats.aspx?ID=780) skill feat.
name: Desert Tracker

text: Desert Tracker Source World Guide pg. 58 2.0 Region Golden Road You’re at home blazing trails in the burning sands, and you made a living guiding or following creatures in the desert. You might be a native nomad, an experienced desert guide, a naturalist, a bandit driven into the dunes by the law—or all of the above. Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost. You're trained in the Survival skill, and the Desert Lore skill. You gain the Experienced Tracker skill feat.
